name: BAR-ET
description:
Buddies Matty and Mati goes to a bar to chill. After one of them passed out from drinking, the bar was already closed and they found themselves locked inside. They have to search a way out to go back to their homeworld on time or they will lose their jobs!

Genre : Puzzle, Exploration

Duration : ~60 minutes

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

"BAR-ET" is my first ever game I created in 2016. It is the predecessor of "DER-ET (DEMO)". Please keep in mind that this game is very outdated. The story and characters has immensely developed, changed, and improved, just like me myself :)

I am re-releasing this because on 10th January 2016, me and my friends created a fantasy OC universe which was the setting of this game! Happy 7th anniversary, OtherWorld!
